Package io.helidon.security.abac.spi

Attribute based access control (ABAC) security provider's SPI. Implement AbacValidator and expose it as a java service using AbacValidatorService.
See Also:
AbacValidator, AbacValidatorService
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AbacValidator<T extends AbacValidatorConfig>
    Service interface for attribute based access control (ABAC) validator.
    AbacValidatorService
    Service to use with ServiceLoader to map configuration to AbacValidator.
